headline.main: NAVY LEAGUE GIVES BALL FOR BRITISH; 1,000 Attend Event at Waldorf, Including Diplomats and Leaders in Defense

lead_paragraph: With a patriotic motif combining national defense projects, and British-American unity and war relief, a gala Navy Ball was given last night in the grand ballroom of the Waldorf-Astoria, under the joint auspices of Bundles for Britain and the Navy League of the United States.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: NAVY LEAGUE OF THE U S
